articles.title: Infy, TCS lead as 4 out of India Inc Top 10 suffer Rs 23,417-cr loss to valuation - Moneycontrol
articles.description: While Reliance Industries Ltd, TCS, Hindustan Unilever Ltd and Infosys faced erosion from their market capitalisation (mcap), HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, ITC, Bharti Airtel, State Bank of India, and Bajaj Finance witnessed a combined addition of Rs 17,386.45 crore.
articles.content:
The combined market valuation of four of the top-10 most valued firms fell by Rs 23,417.15 crore last week, with IT majors Infosys and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) taking the biggest hit.

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: FPIs selling spree continues; pull out Rs 5,800 cr from equities in Nov - Business Standard
articles.description: Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) selling spree continued as they dumped Indian equity worth over Rs 5,800 crore this month so far on rising interest rates and geopolitical tensions in the Middle East.
articles.content: Before the outflow, FPIs were incessantly buying Indian equities in the last six months from March to August and brought in Rs 1.74 trillion during the period.
